author: @aviralbhat

Indian firms underinvesting in R&D may also be cultural 

Big 5 IT firms gave out $90B in dividends, built huge cash reserves, instead of reinvesting

Older Indian firms have grown up in scarcity, perhaps the mindset makes them conservative

Next-gen like Zomato will be audacious

author: @Sugamyata
text:
More than 130 crore persons with disabilities represent a huge, underserved market.
To include us, companies must:
 Follow Accessibility Standards (WCAG: https://w3.org/WAI/fundamentals/accessibility-intro/#examples…)
 Sensitize & train developers
 Take feedback from real users like us (5/6)

author: @Humblebumbum
text:
Unpopular opinion: Zomato's delivery fee is more expensive than the actual food sometimes.

₹49 for food + ₹25 delivery + ₹10 platform fee + ₹5 packaging = ₹89 total

For a ₹49 meal 

Am I the only one who thinks this is getting out of hand?

author: @LancerFlying
text:
LAT Aerospace, co-founded by Zomato's Deepinder Goyal, is Developing a 24-Seater STOL Aircraft Positioned Above NAL Saras Mk2 
NAL Saras has been under development since 1991. Cancelled in 2016 and revived in 2017.
The first Saras (PT1) flew in 2004
Mark-2's maiden flight by 2027
